name: A New Dawn (JedidiY)
description:
In "A New Dawn," players embark on a thrilling adventure where they must navigate through an ever-changing world that alternates between two game modes. With An End of each day, A New cycle Begins, and the game presents fresh challenges that require quick thinking and reflexes. Players will face obstacles and enemies as they strive to reach the end of the level and progress to the next day. The dynamic game modes ensure that players never get bored, as they experience the thrill of an adventure game one day and the excitement of a runner game the next. 

"A New Dawn" encapsulates the game jam theme "an end is a new beginning" by offering a constant cycle of challenges that keep players engaged and eager to explore this exciting and ever-changing world.

Controls:

A-D 'horizontal' , S 'Shield', SPACE 'Jump
